Broadcast `clamp`:
```julia> A = [1.0, 1.5, 0.2];

julia> clamp.(A, -Inf, 1.0)
3-element Vector{Float64}:
 1.0
 1.0
 0.2```
or if you want to modify `A` you can use `clamp!`:
```julia> clamp!(A, -Inf, 1.0)
3-element Vector{Float64}:
 1.0
 1.0
 0.2```
